p: When compared to untreated cells, VEGF and TGF- β1 levels were greatly decreased ( p < 0.05), < while TNF- α content was greatly increased in SGC-7901 cells ( p < 0.05) < following incubation with increasing concentration (0–75 µM) of z-guggulsterone ( Figure 4(a)). However, TNF- α, VEGF, and TGF- β1 contents were only minimally affected in GES-1 cells following incubation with 75 µM z-guggulsterone ( p > 0.05) ( Figure 4(b)).
